Reviews.Title: As of now
Reviews.Author: A. Cate
Reviews.Content: So Far everything has been perfect, we have had them almost a month if not so, Set up was easy.  only thing we are having a haaard time with is the skype update.  other then that they are great!

Reviews.Title: Salt
Reviews.Author: louis saltarelli
Reviews.Content: Very good tool to keep a extra eye. Hook up is easy only thing I could recommend is extension cords for electric power. Seems they are unavailable in most stores that stock the unit.

Reviews.Title: Great system, great price!
Reviews.Author: cmares
Reviews.Content: We mounted the cameras on the brick on the front of our house.  The set up was easy and the wireless reception has a far reach! The only thing I didn't like was that the cameras needed to be plugged into an outlet. This limits the places that the cameras can be mounted.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Pankaj
Reviews.Content: very cool product for that price, the camera installation is little pain depending on how far it is from the display. you may have to add the extender. but it works well

Reviews.Title: piece of mind
Reviews.Author: John Lundberg
Reviews.Content: This product performed better than expected. I have secured my driveway and front door.  wireless picture is good enough to id someone.

Reviews.Title: Security camera
Reviews.Author: Jackie C. Stutz "Tacoma"
Reviews.Content: Some shortfalls but overall what I expected .The recording options are limited ,but still useful!Can't beat this system for the cost!

Reviews.Title: Worst Customer Service Ever
Reviews.Author: Kevin J. Degnan
Reviews.Content: This is the closest item I can find to the one I ordered. I ordered a 4-camera system (no longer offered) and got a 2-camera system with two additional different model cameras. The different cameras do not work the system properly and make it basically useless as a 4 camera system. I have been trying to resolve this with Lorex for over a month and just keep getting stall tactics. The only thing they are efficient at is taking your money. Trying to get what you paid for is impossible. They keep asking for the same information, which I have sent them at least 5 times. Their tactic seems to be to wear you down to the point you just want to give up. I am looking elsewhere to complete the security system I started. It would be prudent of you to do likewise.

ProductInfo.Features:
7" Lcd Equipped With Built-In Wireless Receiver & Sd Recorder
3 Record Choices: Motion Detection, Continuous Or Scheduled
Remote Access Of Camera Capable Via Skype(R)
Date Stamped Recordings For Faster Event Search
Record At Vga Or Qvga Resolution
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex LORLW2712 7-Inch LCD with 2 Cameras
